contentrichtext.text: '''Connie Mack''' may refer to: * [[Connie Mack I]] (1862–1956), Hall of Fame baseball manager, player, owner * [[Connie Mack III]] (born 1940), U.S. Representative (1983–1989), U.S. Senator (1989–2001) from Florida (grandson of the above) * [[Connie Mack IV]] (born 1967), U.S. Representative from Florida, 2004–present (son of Connie III) ==See also== *[[Connie Mack Field]], West Palm Beach, Florida *[[Shibe Park]], former ballfield in Philadelphia later renamed '''Connie Mack Stadium''' *[[Connie Mak]], female Hong Kong singer, also called Kitman Mak {{hndis|name=Mack, Connie}}
